lines: I say, weren't you one of the ones who was with my grandson Wiscar? I knew I recognized you. My heartfelt thanks, lasslad, for liberating our homeland. I didn't think the day would come, leastwise not within my lifetime.

To be sure, there's still much and more work to do before Ala Mhigo can know her former glory, but together we'll rebuild her, one block at a time. Young ones like you and Wiscar have already put in the hardest yalms; it's time for this old fossil to put in some of his own!
It'll be nice to have some Resistance lads and lasses around to watch over us. No one wants to worry about being dragged into the loch while you're just trying to get an honest day's work done.
There's a hundred and one things to do, but I'll see the Saltery running again─you mark my words!
